mapper.select: SELECT ID, -- primary key PASSWORD, CUSTOM_ID, -- foreign key (custom_comp TBL) (SELECT CUSTOM_NM FROM CUSTOM_COMP WHERE CUSTOM_ID = CUSTOM_COMP_LOGIN.CUSTOM_ID) AS CUSTOM_NAME, -- foreign key (코드TBL) CUSTOM_GRADE, (SELECT GRADE_NAME FROM CUSTOM_GRADE WHERE GRADE_CODE = CUSTOM_GRADE) AS GRADE_NAME, -- foreign key (코드TBL) POINT, VISIT_CNT, TODAY_CNT, LOGIN_DATE, LOGOUT_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, DELETE_DATE FROM CUSTOM_COMP_LOGIN WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{pwd} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL ; -- primary key(id) indexing
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOM_COMP_LOGIN SET TODAY_CNT = 0, LOGIN_DATE = DEFAULT, LOGIN_USER = #{id}, UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT, UPDATE_USER = #{id} WHERE ID = #{id} AND CUSTOM_ID = #{customId} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE CUSTOM_COMP_LOGIN SET VISIT_CNT = VISIT_CNT+1, TODAY_CNT = TODAY_CNT+1, UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT, UPDATE_USER = #{id} WHERE ID = #{id} AND CUSTOM_ID = #{customId} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE CUSTOM_COMP_LOGIN SET POINT = POINT + 100, UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT, UPDATE_USER = #{id} WHERE ID = #{id} AND CUSTOM_ID = #{customId} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE CUSTOM_COMP_LOGIN SET DELETE_DATE = DEFAULT, DELETE_USER = #{id}, LOGOUT_DATE = DEFAULT, LOGOUT_USER = #{id} WHERE ID = #{id} AND CUSTOM_ID = #{customId}
UPDATE CUSTOM_COMP_LOGIN SET LOGOUT_DATE = DEFAULT, LOGOUT_USER = #{id} WHERE ID = #{id} AND CUSTOM_ID = #{customId} AND DELETE_DATE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(ID) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) AS ISEXIST_ID FROM CUSTOM_COMP_LOGIN WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT IF(COUNT(COMPANY_NO) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) AS ISEXIST_COMPANY_NO FROM CUSTOM_COMP WHERE COMPANY_NO = #{companyNo} -- Unique key(company_no) indexing
SELECT IF(COUNT(EMAIL) > 0, TRUE, FALSE) AS ISEXIST_EMAIL FROM CUSTOM_COMP WHERE EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CUSTOM_ID) + 1, (CASE WHEN #{customKindCode} = 1 OR #{customKindCode} = 2 THEN 100 ELSE #{customKindCode} END) * 100000 + 1) AS OBT_CUSTOM_ID FROM CUSTOM_COMP WHERE SUBSTRING(CUSTOM_ID, 1,3) = CASE WHEN #{customKindCode} = 1 OR #{customKindCode} = 2 THEN 100 ELSE #{customKindCode} END; -- primary key(custom_id) indexing을 조건절에서 SUBSTRING에 사용하면 조회속도가 높을것 같기도 하는데요
